message: Who is the hell said anything about WHERE Obama was born? I'm sorry you had to deal with stupid security officers and store owners... ; however, maybe that Asian salon owner wasn't being racist but rather did not have the education to cut coarser hair and was knowledgeable enough to know where her skills lacked ability. I've had terrible haircuts because the stylist didn't have the knowledge to cut my funky asian hair and didn't inform me of that. Unfortunately not all salon schools or hair stylists learn to cut all types of hair. If she was being racist I'm sorry. Personally i wouldn't want to support her business because either she's racist or needs more training.
